definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: Tosun tzu, war is a matter of life and death. This is the key principle of histeachings.
sentences.chinese: 孫子認爲戰爭關乎生死，這是他所提倡的關鍵原則。

sentences.english: If I must boast, I will boast of the things that show my weakness.
sentences.chinese: 我若必須自誇，就誇那關乎我軟弱的事便了。

sentences.english: The twelfth house is associated with rest and reflection, not with strenuous activity.
sentences.chinese: 第十二宮關乎休息和反思，而非繁重的活動。

sentences.english: Because it's not just about admitting, it's about perceiving.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這不僅僅是關於承認，這還關乎察覺認識。

sentences.english: This is nothing to do with logos or overt symbols.
sentences.chinese: 這無關乎商標或者明顯的標誌。

sentences.english: These success stories revolve strictly around perception and choice.
sentences.chinese: 這些成功故事主要關乎於悟性和選擇。

sentences.english: This is not about money – this is about engineering.
sentences.chinese: 這不關乎金錢，而是關乎設計。

sentences.english: This is not about money – this is about engineering.
sentences.chinese: 這不關乎金錢，而是關乎設計。

sentences.english: It is a matter of chance which we are in," he said.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個關乎人類存在的概率問題，”他說。

sentences.english: It wasn't just junk-bond investors - banks drank the Kool-Aid too.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅僅關乎那些垃圾債券的投資者，銀行也有份。

sentences.english: Nor will there be any change to the eligibility standards for military benefits.
sentences.chinese: 以及關乎部隊利益的選拔合格標準也不會改變。

sentences.english: If I must needs glory, I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities.
sentences.chinese: 我若必須自誇，就誇那關乎我軟弱的事便了。

sentences.english: It's not just about what's fun to read, although it is that too.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅僅關乎閱讀樂趣，儘管樂趣也在其中。

sentences.english: If I must boast, I will boast of the things that concern myweakness.
sentences.chinese: 我若必須自誇，就誇那關乎我軟弱的事便了。

sentences.english: Education is the lifeblood of the country.
sentences.chinese: 教育事業的成敗關乎國脈的盛衰。
